text: Melt butter in skillet.  Lightly brown chicken breasts in melted butter. Set aside and keep warm. Brown mushrooms in skillet. You may have to add an extra tablespoon of butter to brown the mushrooms. Remove the browned mushrooms to a bowl. Use a slotted spoon to remove the mushrooms. Add the flour and chicken broth to the skillet. Whisk until smooth. Cook for 3 to 4 minutes or until slightly thickened. Spray a 9-inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. Add the brown chicken breasts, mushrooms and gravy to pan. Season lightly with salt and pepper.  Cover pan and bake chicken at 350 °F (177 °C) for about 45 minutes or until chicken tests done.  Serves 4.  Finished.
